price: Báwo ni ẹ ṣe ń ṣàì gbàgbọ́ nínú Allāhu ná! Bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni òkú ni yín (tẹ́lẹ̀), Ó sì sọ yín di alààyè. Lẹ́yìn náà, Ó máa sọ yín di òkú. Lẹ́yìn náà, Ó máa sọ yín di alààyè. Lẹ́yìn náà, ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀ ni wọn yóò da yín padà sí.¹
arabic: كَيۡفَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَكُنتُمۡ أَمۡوَٰتٗا فَأَحۡيَٰكُمۡۖ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kayfa takfurūna bil-lahi wakuntum amwātan fa-aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥ'yīkum thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
translations: He will cause you to die
